metadata.title: AI FileSense - AI-Powered File Organization for Windows
metadata.description: Organize years of files in minutes, not hours. AI reads your documents and sorts them into clean folders—no configuration required.

footer.tagline: AI-powered file organization for Windows. Your files stay on your computer—only small text snippets are sent to AI for smart classification.

hero.title: Organize years of files in minutes.
hero.subtitle: AI FileSense reads your documents and intelligently categorizes them into a clean 11-folder structure. Preview everything. Undo anything. Lose nothing.

solution.title: How It Works
solution.subtitle: From chaos to organized in three steps
solution.step1Desc: Point to Desktop, Documents, or Downloads. AI FileSense finds PDFs, Word docs, PowerPoint, and text files.
solution.step2Desc: Claude AI reads file contents to understand what each document is—not just filenames. A file named scan_2024.pdf gets correctly categorized.
solution.step3Desc: Preview where every file will go. Change any suggestion. Then apply—files move to Documents/Organized Files/ with full undo capability.

features.title: Built for Trust, Designed for Everyone
features.subtitle: Powerful AI that anyone can use
features.aiClassificationDesc: Understands what's inside your files, not just filenames. scan_2024.pdf becomes correctly categorized as Medical or Financial.
features.smartFoldersDesc: Pre-designed categories that work for 95% of personal and professional files: Work, Personal, Financial, Medical, Legal, and more.
features.oneClickDesc: Transform years of digital clutter into order in minutes, not hours. No manual sorting required.
features.safeReversibleDesc: See exactly where every file will go before anything moves. Changed your mind? Restore everything instantly.
features.privacyFirstDesc: Your files never leave your computer. Only tiny text snippets sent to AI. No account required.
features.fullyBilingualDesc: Complete English and Spanish (Mexico) interface. AI understands documents in both languages.

folders.subtitle: Pre-designed categories for personal and professional documents
folders.workDesc: Resumes, job offers, performance reviews, payslips, employment contracts
folders.personalDesc: Personal correspondence, family documents, personal projects, life admin
folders.financialDesc: Bank statements, tax returns, investments, receipts, invoices, budgets

folders.legalDesc: Contracts, agreements, licenses, IDs, passports, legal correspondence
folders.educationDesc: Course materials, certificates, transcripts, diplomas, research papers
folders.creativeDesc: Design files, writing projects, artwork, creative briefs, portfolio pieces

folders.archiveDesc: Older documents, completed projects, historical records

cta.title: Ready to Get Organized?
cta.subtitle: Download AI FileSense and organize your files in minutes. No account needed, no configuration required.

hero.title: AI That Reads Your Documents So You Don't Have To
hero.subtitle: Smart organization that runs entirely on your computer

folderSelection.title: 1. Folder Selection
folderSelection.description: Choose which folders to scan—Desktop, Documents, Downloads. Start with the messiest one.

fileTypes.title: 2. File Types
fileTypes.description: Select file types to organize: PDF, Word, PowerPoint, or text files. Skip what you don't need.

personalization.title: 3. Personalization
personalization.description: Answer 2-3 quick questions about your preferences—folder depth and lookup style. Takes 30 seconds.

scanning.title: 4. Scanning
scanning.description: AI FileSense scans your folders and extracts text snippets from documents. Files never leave your computer.

classification.title: 5. AI Classification
classification.description: Claude AI analyzes content and assigns categories. A file named doc123.pdf gets categorized correctly based on what's inside.

quickFixes.title: 6. Quick Fixes
quickFixes.description: Review AI suggestions. Answer clarifying questions for low-confidence files. Your input improves accuracy.

preview.title: 7. Preview
preview.description: See exactly where each file will move before committing. Change any suggestion you disagree with.

apply.title: 8. Apply & Success
apply.description: Files move to Documents/Organized Files/ in numbered folders. Full undo capability—restore anything with one click.

differentiators.title: What Makes AI FileSense Different
differentiators.subtitle: Built for people who've tried and failed to organize manually

contentBased.title: AI Reads Content, Not Just Filenames
contentBased.description: A file named doc123.pdf gets categorized correctly based on what's inside. Invoices, contracts, medical records—all identified automatically.

zeroConfig.title: Zero Configuration
zeroConfig.description: Download, install, run. No API keys to set up, no technical knowledge required. Just click and organize.

safeByDefault.title: Safe by Default
safeByDefault.description: Preview everything before moving. Undo anytime. Files are moved, never deleted. Every action is logged.

trulyBilingual.title: Truly Bilingual
trulyBilingual.description: Full English and Spanish (Mexico) support throughout. Documents in either language are understood and categorized correctly.

privacyFirst.title: Privacy-First Architecture
privacyFirst.description: Files never leave your computer. Only small text snippets sent to AI. Your username is stripped from file paths.

incremental.title: Incremental Processing
incremental.description: Only processes new or changed files on subsequent runs. Run it weekly to keep things organized automatically.

fileTypes.title: Supported File Types
fileTypes.subtitle: AI FileSense extracts content from these document formats

roadmap.title: Product Roadmap
roadmap.subtitle: Where we are and where we're going

phase1.title: Phase 1
phase1.description: Core features: AI classification, 11-folder system, preview & undo, bilingual support, crash recovery, zero configuration.

phase2.title: Phase 2
phase2.description: Excel/CSV support, image classification, file watcher for auto-organize, custom rules engine, advanced filtering.

phase3.title: Phase 3
phase3.description: macOS and Linux support, cloud sync options, team sharing features, enterprise integrations.

hero.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
hero.subtitle: Free to use, no subscription required

freeForNow.title: Free During Launch
freeForNow.subtitle: No payment required
freeForNow.description: AI FileSense is completely free to use during our launch period. No subscription fees, no hidden costs. Just download and organize.

faq.title: Pricing FAQ
faq.a1: Yes. During our launch period, AI FileSense is completely free to use with no limitations. No credit card required.
faq.q2: Will there be a paid version later?
faq.a2: We may introduce premium features in the future, but core functionality will always have a free tier.
faq.q3: Do I need to create an account?
faq.a3: No. AI FileSense works without any account or sign-up. Just download and run.
faq.a4: No limits on files or folders during the free launch period. Organize as much as you want.
faq.a5: Not yet, but it's on our roadmap. Contact us if you're interested in team features.
faq.a6: It's free right now! When we introduce paid features, we'll offer discounts for students, educators, and nonprofits.

activityLog.title: Activity Log & Undo
activityLog.description: Every file move is tracked. Undo a single file, an entire session, or roll back everything. Even if the app crashes, you can recover.

features.fullRollback: Roll back to any previous state

tips.title: Tips for Best Results
tips.tip1Desc: Your Downloads folder is usually the messiest. Start there and see results immediately.
tips.tip2Desc: Always review the plan before applying. You can change any suggestion.
tips.tip3Desc: The Activity Log tracks everything. You can always go back.
tips.tip4Desc: AI FileSense only processes new files on repeat runs. Keep things organized automatically.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about AI FileSense.

questions.q1: Is my data safe? Do my files get uploaded anywhere?
questions.a1: Your files never leave your computer. AI FileSense only sends small text snippets (~500 characters) to the AI for classification. Full file contents are never transmitted. Your username is stripped from file paths for additional privacy.
questions.q2: What happens if I don't like how files were organized?
questions.a2: Every file move is logged with the original and new location. You can undo any single file move, undo an entire session, or roll back everything to the original state. Even if the app crashes mid-organization, you can fully recover.
questions.q3: Why are some files put in the 'Review' folder?
questions.a3: When the AI isn't confident about where a file belongs, it goes to the Review folder (11 Review). This keeps your organization clean while letting you make the final call on ambiguous documents.
questions.q4: Can I exclude certain files from being organized?
questions.a4: Yes. During the preview phase, you can deselect any files you want to keep in place. You can also exclude entire folders or file types from scanning in the initial setup.
questions.q5: Does AI FileSense work with languages other than English?
questions.a5: Yes! AI FileSense is fully bilingual with complete English and Spanish (Mexico) support. The AI can read and correctly categorize documents written in either language.
questions.a6: AI FileSense extracts content from PDF files (first page), Word documents (.doc, .docx), PowerPoint (.pptx), and text files (.txt, .md, .log, .csv). Any file can be classified by filename alone.
questions.q7: Where do my organized files go?
questions.a7: Files are moved to Documents/Organized Files/ into 11 numbered folders (01 Work through 11 Review). The numbered prefixes keep folders in logical order in File Explorer.
questions.q8: Can I run AI FileSense again after organizing?
questions.a8: Absolutely. AI FileSense only processes new or changed files on repeat runs. Run it weekly to keep things organized automatically.
questions.q9: What if the AI categorizes a file incorrectly?
questions.a9: You always preview all changes before they happen. Simply change the suggested folder during preview. If you notice an error after organizing, use the Activity Log to move the file wherever you want.
questions.a10: An internet connection is needed for AI classification. However, scanning files, reviewing changes, and undoing moves all work completely offline.
questions.q11: Do I need to set up an API key or create an account?
questions.a11: No. AI FileSense works out of the box with no configuration required. No API keys, no accounts, no sign-up. Just download and run.

hero.title: About AI FileSense
hero.subtitle: Local-first file organization powered by AI

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We built AI FileSense because organizing files shouldn't mean uploading your personal documents to someone else's server. Your medical records, tax documents, and personal files deserve better than cloud storage and vague privacy policies.

commitment.title: Our Privacy Commitment
commitment.intro: We don't just talk about privacy—we built it into the architecture:

items.local: 100% local processing: Your files never leave your computer
items.minimal: Minimal data to AI: Only small text snippets for classification
items.noAccount: No account required: No signup, no email, no tracking
items.noTelemetry: Zero telemetry: We don't collect analytics or usage data
items.noConfig: No configuration: Works out of the box, no API keys needed
items.encrypted: Transaction logging: Every move tracked for easy undo

values.title: What We Believe
values.privacyDesc: Your files stay on your computer. We never see your data—not filenames, not contents, not metadata. We built it this way on purpose.
values.simplicityDesc: Powerful AI shouldn't mean complex software. Download, install, run—no technical skills required.
values.transparencyDesc: Preview everything before it moves. Undo anything after it moves. You're always in the driver's seat.
